Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitAdminInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitAdminService
public interface FlipFitAdminInterface
Interface defining the operations that an admin can perform in the FlipFit system. This includes approving, rejecting, and removing gym owners and centres, as well as displaying their information.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • approveOwner

      void approveOwner(String gymOwnerId) throws InvalidGymOwnerException
      Approves a gym owner based on their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the unique identifier of the gym owner to be approved
      Throws:
      InvalidGymOwnerException - if the gym owner ID is invalid or if the operation fails
